description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows secure kernel mode elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43528):

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates for your system version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This vulnerability allows escalation of privilege due to heap-based buffer overflows in secure kernel mode. Ensure that your system falls within the listed build numbers for successful patching.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from:
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280).

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm your system is running one of the affected Windows versions listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
